channel.title: I can't get my runserver batch file to work
channel.description: hello, i am ethan but i need help with my runserver whenever i open it to try and run my server i see this in the box that opens "server is allready in use" so here is what it say's when i hit "edit" on it i was wondering if this is right...."@echo off title ethanpk java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.0.12-ga-bin.jar server" so if anyone could tell me what i am doing wrong... =] well reply if you can help me.

item.title: I can't get my runserver batch file to work
item.dc:creator: @ethanpk ethanpk
item.description:
@ethanpk wrote:

how do i make sure that the port is open?

oh and thanks for the help everyone =]
